summary: Provides a mock implementation of the AWS Elastic File System (EFS) service, including custom error types, in‑memory resource models (file systems, access points, mount targets, etc.), and response handlers that emulate the EFS API for creation, deletion, description, configuration, and tagging operations.
business_intent: Allows developers to test and develop applications that interact with EFS without accessing real AWS resources, facilitating unit and integration testing, CI pipelines, and CloudFormation template validation.
